## Description {#details}

Common features for diagnostics with an associated location.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>Fn</code> is the function where the diagnostic is being emitted.

<code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the location information to use in the diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00345">345</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

### getLocationStr() {#a1f8e30e4b79049f59395eb471b4ddcf4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="std::string DiagnosticInfoWithLocationBase::getLocationStr () const">
Return a string with the location information for this diagnostic in the format &quot;file:line:col&quot;.

If location information is not available, it returns &quot;&lt;unknown&gt;:0:0&quot;.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00357">357</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp/#l00188">188</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp">DiagnosticInfo.cpp</a>.
